text: The women's 1500 metres event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 19 and 21 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Abebech Nigussie ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Rose Kosgei ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Georgie Clarke ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 21 October {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
